tagline: Negar trying to be a spell corrector for persian language.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
### Welcome to Negar Pages.
Negar will not do any special thing except try to help you in write a more beautiful Persian text. for now it helps you in editing your pages with legal space character & complete Persian alphabet. In the future it will have a spell corrector engine and a graphical user interface (GUI).  

### Screenshot
![NegarsScreenshot](https://raw.github.com/shahinism/Negar/master/Negar-State.png)

### how to use it:
```
$ git clone https://github.com/shahinism/Negar.git
$ cp Negar/Virastar.py /usr/bin
$ Virastar.py FILENAME > output
```

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### Programmers
Every programmers who interested in this project is capable to fork it and help me to add new features to it. Negar will be a Free software.

### Apologies 
I'm a new programmer and there is a lot of things I don't know about programming. if you know more than me and encountered with my horrible mistakes, please feel free and teach me!

And more important thing! I have a weak English skills. I'm sorry for my mistakes :D

### Contact
Email: ishahinism [at] Gmail
name: Negar
